english.segment1: Why seek out the truth in a world of lies to unmask right in wrongs disguise;. to be sincere in the crowds that fall, and not to be satisfied with less than your all?.. all?
english.segment2: Lifting of the weak starts inside. Your compromise, choose your side or stand aside.
english.segment3: Your pride can be your best friend or your enemy. It can tear from side to side to mediocrity. Faith in what can be accomplished with your life . decide to choose a higher standard for your fight.. fight.
english.segment4: Your life sets the stage, be strong in your beliefs, and lend a helping hand to lift the weak to stand. Lifting.. lifting.. lifting.. lifting up the weak.
english.segment5: Lifting of the weak starts inside. Your.. your compromise, choose your side or stand aside.. aside.
